'''O'Shea Jackson Sr.''', known professionally as '''Ice Cube''', is an American rapper and actor.

== Background ==
{{Empty section}}

== In the Minecraft franchise ==
In 2025, Jackson starred in a series of advertisements for the [[Claims Adjuster Add-On]], where he played a fictionalized version of himself. Within the videos, he plays up his own personality, constantly mocking people who send in claims for lost [[items]].
